scenario_text.value: Argh! He is too strong!

Wait, everyone! This is no time to get bogged
down in a fight! Look, over there!

Hey, hey.
What’s with that creepy fog?
Is it heading towards Miyuki?

That fog! It’s the same as when Shuuji
disappeared!

That fog is getting closer and closer to
Miyuki!

It will cover her soon!
We have to do something!
I won’t let that happen! Miyuki!
The professor is trying to save her?!
You can’t do it alone, Professor!

Did you think I would allow you to touch the
maiden?
Rrk!
Professor! We have to help him!
Professor!!!
Begone.
ARRROOOOOOOOO!!!
Argh...
Garurumon...protected the professor?
But why?
Garurumon, what are you doing?

I can’t forgive this old geezer.
I can’t forget my hatred!

And so I can’t allow you to die like this
before you receive my hatred in full!
So you have joined the fools?

Then join them in their fate as well. Become
prey, to be devoured by this world!
Garurumon... Please...

Just once. One more time is all.
Lend me your strength!

For Miyuki, for Renamon, for you! I never
want you to suffer ever again!

...Fine.
Just this once!

My fated Kemonogami! Let the bond we once
shared return to us one more time!
Grrraaaaaawrrr!
Garurumon, evolve tooo...!
...WereGarurumon!!!
Garurumon evolved...
He evolved for the professor?

Let’s go, Takuma! Everyone, we need to get to
Miyuki before the fog takes her away!

Hurry up and defeat Piedmon, and rescue the
maiden. Rescue Miyuki!
We’re on it!

(The fog hasn’t reached Miyuki yet. If we
beat him in time, we can still save her!)
